free.chess
Class PlainBoardPainter

java.lang.Object
  free.chess.PlainBoardPainter
All Implemented Interfaces:
BoardPainter, ColoredBoardPainter
Direct Known Subclasses:
DefaultBoardPainter
public class PlainBoardPainter
extends java.lang.Object
implements ColoredBoardPainter

An implementation of BoardPainter which fills the SQUARES with colors.

Constructor Summary
PlainBoardPainter(java.awt.Color lightColor, java.awt.Color darkColor)
          Creates a new PlainBoardPainter which paints SQUARES with the given light square color and dark square color.
 
Method Summary
 java.awt.Color getDarkColor()
          Returns the color with which dark SQUARES are drawn.
 java.awt.Color getLightColor()
          Returns the color with which light SQUARES are drawn.
 java.awt.Dimension getPreferredBoardSize()
          Returns a 0x0 Dimension since we don't care at which size to draw the board.
 void paintBoard(java.awt.Graphics g, java.awt.Component component, int x, int y, int width, int height)
          Paints the board at the given location on the given Graphics scaled to the given size.
 void setDarkColor(java.awt.Color color)
          Sets the color of the dark SQUARES.
 void setLightColor(java.awt.Color color)
          Sets the color of the light SQUARES.
